src:
Pogrešajo 14-letnega Domna Gradišnika
04 Nov 2019, 19:07 by STA

Svojci pogrešajo 14-letnega Domna Gradišnika iz Dobriše vasi na območju šentjurske policijske postaje, so sporočili s Policijske uprave (PU) Celje. Nazadnje so ga videli danes okoli 13. ure v bližini Osnovne šole Franja Malgaja v Šentjurju.



Svojci pogrešajo 14-letnega Domna Gradišnika iz Dobriše vasi na območju šentjurske policijske postaje. 

ŠENTJUR > Pogrešani je po podatkih policije oblečen v spodnji del trenerke temno sive barve, temno jopico s kapuco in bundo z vojaškim vzorcem. Na glavi ima kapo s šiltom. Obut je v modre športne copate znamke Adidas.
Vse, ki so ga opazili, na celjski PU naprošajo, naj to sporočijo na telefonsko številko 113.
text:
They miss 14-year-old Dom Gradisnik
04 Nov 2019, 19:07 by STA

Relatives miss 14-year-old Domen Gradišnik from Dobriša vas in the area of the Šentjur police station, the Police Directorate (Celje) said. He was last seen around 1pm today near Francis Malgai Primary School in Sentjur.



The relatives miss 14-year-old Dom Gradišnik from Dobriša vas in the area of the Šentjur police station.

ŠENTJUR> According to police, the missing man is dressed in a dark gray tracksuit, a dark hooded sweatshirt and a military-style pumpkin. He has a cap on his head. The footwear is in blue Adidas sports shoes.
All those who have been noticed are asked to inform the Celje Police Department at 113.
